channel.title: Weeknotes on Peter Jordan
channel.description: Recent content in Weeknotes on Peter Jordan

item.title: Weeknotes 01-02
item.description: I’ve been following the trials, tribulations and successes of colleagues in their weeknotes over the last while. So now I’m having a go - to share my working week as Head of Performance and Data Analysis at GDS. I started writing some notes last week, but before I knew it, it was this week. So here are two weeks worth. Week 1: 10 July Monday Still getting into the stride of my new and longer commute from Waterloo to GDS’ new abode at Aldgate.
